description: Art imitates our love for the mountains in this Ski Zero Cushion Chasing Mountains Print Over the Calf Socks. Feel all-day comfort in a one-of-a-kind sock designed by Vernan Kee, in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities. With breathability, durability, and a performance-ready fit, this sock has everything you need to keep chasing mountains again and again…and again.
name: Smartwool Ski Zero Cushion Chasing Mountains Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 55% Merino Wool 12% Nylon 29% Recycled Nylon 3% Elastane 1% Polyester
